result.title: Product Engineer (at a series D fintech company)
result.description:
As a software engineer in product engineering, you will have the opportunity to work on our applications in concert with our product and design teams. You will make impactful product features a reality across a variety of product verticals, including advisor workflows, calculations, client communications, in-app integrations and our mobile and tablet applications.

Requirements:

B.S., M.S., or Ph.D. in Computer Science or similar technical field of study (or equivalent practical experience.).
5+ years experience as a professional software engineer.
A passion for implementing best practices and a bias toward smart automation.
Proven ability to collaborate with and mentor other engineers.
Experience building scalable systems, modeling financial data, or building intuitive, feature-rich user interfaces.
2+ years of experience with other JavaScript frameworks such as React, Vue.js or Angular. Ember.js is a huge plus.
Excellent written, verbal, and interpersonal communication skills.
